bill.title: COVID-19; frontline worker payment provided, unemployment trust fund replenished, employer base tax rate frozen, calendar year 2022 and 2023 additional assessment eliminated, special assessment rate redetermination authorized, family and medical leave benefits provided, earned sick and safe time provided, reports required, and money appropriated.
